title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Simulation-Based Medical Language Education Program: Advanced Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use specialized terminology and protocols for at least three emergency scenarios in a simulation environment.
Learners can perform communication skills reflecting cultural sensitivity in VR-based patient interaction scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can write reflective journals and develop improvement plans based on simulation performance results through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
